notes:
Hey, Standard Trust Bank - thanks for putting that 419
warning message up on your website at
http://www.standardtrustbank.com.

Let the lessons begin.  Thanks to the online
Swedish/English dictionary:
http://www-lexikon.nada.kth.se/skolverket/swe-eng.shtml


Halla = Hello, Tag fast tjuven! = Stop, thief!

Halla to your goodself!  If you're "haapy" and you
know it shake your head (while you "translet"):

+++

bränt barn skyr elden = once bitten, twice shy.

+++

Meanwhile, 10% and 50% are apparently THE SAME THING. 
Kids, let this be a lesson to you - don't drop out
early.  Read this math lesson from the lad slowly -
savor it like a fine wine:

+++

+++

Meanwhile, Agatha's been in a long meeting.  She
missed her chance to stop Lydia:

+++

messages.subject: URGENT CONTRACT.
messages.body:
Received: from  



BRANCH MANAGER S.T.B 

ATTN:THE DIRECTOR /CEO, 
Dear sir, 
AN URGENT BUSINESS PROPOSAL 
I am pleased to get across to you for a very urgent 
and profitable business proposal. Though I don?t know 
you neither have I seen you before but my confidence 
was reposed on you when the Chief Executive of Lagos 
State chamber of Commerce and Industry handed me your 
contact for a confidential business. 
I am the manager of Standard Trust Bank Plc.(S.T.B), 
Ilupeju branch, Lagos _Nigeria. The intended business 
is thus; we had a customer, a Foreigner (a SWEDISH) 
resident in Nigeria, he was a Contractor with one of 
the Government parastatal. He has in his account in my

branch the sum of US$14.5 Million (Fourteen Million 
Five Hundred Thousand U.S.Dollars). Unfortunately, the

man died four years ago until today non-of his next of

kin has come forward to claim the money. Having 
noticed this, I, in c! ollaboration with two other top

Officials of the bank we have covered up the account 
all these while. 

Now we want you (being a foreigner) to be fronted as 
one of his next of kin and forward your account and 
other relevant documents to be advised to you by us to

attest to the Claim. We will use our positions to get 
all internal documentations to back up the claims. 
The whole procedures will last only ten working days 
to get the fund retrieved successfully without trace 
even in future. Your response is only what we are 
waiting for as we have arranged all necessary things. 
As soon as this message comes to you kindly get back 
to me indicating your interest. Then I will furnish 
you with the whole procedures to ensure that the deal 
is successfully concluded. For your assistance we have

agreed to give you twenty five percent (25%) of the
Total 
sum at the end of the transaction. It is risk free and

a mega fortune. All ! correspondence towards this 
transaction will be through email. 
I await your earliest response. 
Thanks,Yours Sincerely 
Dr John.

messages.body:
Dr John,

Halla!  I am thinking this is VERY fortunate for us. 
You need someone who speaks Swedish to be the
recipient of the Swedish man's money, and I know some
Swedish.  Have you ever visited Sweden?  "Hello" is
"Halla!".  Maybe we can visit there together when our
business is concluded.  After all, Jag ar enda barnet
tronarvinge - I am to be the only heir.

I am not sure which bank account you are asking for,
one of my personal accounts or a business account.  I
have both, please let me know.  Also, what bank will
the money be coming from?  If it is not going to be in
dollars, please let me know so I can factor in the
time and charges it takes to make those conversions.

Tag fast tjuven! 
Johnson

messages.body:
Dear JOHNSON SCHULER,
Thanks for your email and your good response to my
mail, i will not waste any time to let you know that
this fund will not waste much time in coming to your
account hence I am in office here, it will not last up
to two weeks, so far you can be able to do what I told
you to do by sending application to the bank for
immediate approval and release of the fund direct to
your account.
As I told you yesterday that I will fully introduce
myself properly to you and give you more details of
this fund to enable you know the nature of the
transaction.
Infact since after discovering of this fund and non
existence of the depositor who owns the fund and non
existence of any next of kin to claim the fund, i have
been praying to the Almighty God to provide for me an
honest business man ( a foreigner) who I can use to
transfer this fund out of the country as I am in
possession of all the valuable documents concerning
this fund. I pray and hope that you are the right
person for me, as you know I am a civil servant and
all my hope of survival is on the conclusion of this
deal and your being faithfully to me at the end of the
day. 
Before I go further I wish to inform you more about my
good self so that you will have detail of who you are
dealing with and i have also attached my photograph
with this mail, for I know it will boost your
confident and trust on me.
I am Dr. John Jones, bank manager of Standard Trust
Bank of Nigeria (plc), I am from the northern part of
the country born in a renowned Christian family of
three (a boy and two girls am the only son) I am 45
years of age a graduate of Ahmed Bello university
Zaria, the countrys most popular university. I have
work with (STB) for ten years, I married with a wife
Agatha and two children Junior and Stephen. I leave in
the (STB) staff quarters plot 115 south west Ikoyi
Lagos. 
I hope you are a Christian too hence I see you as my
brother and with the spirit of brotherhood success is
going to ours on this transaction. All I need is your
honesty and sincerity, the spirit of cheat and
backbiting should be erased from our minds. This fund
can make you a more wealthier person and at the same
time elevate my standard of leaving so let us conclude
this deal with one mind/spirit and establish a better
relationship that can linger to our children. Please
do let me have the details of you and send to me a
copies of the vital pages of your international
passport or your full photograph. 
Now to the process of this payment, as I said all the
valuable documents of this transaction are on my
possession which I will fax to you so that you can go
through it to understand the nature of the deal. 
I am going to present you as the next of kin to the
disease to the board of the (UBA) and I will give you
the text of the application which you should retype on
your company letterhead to the UBA board requesting
the Deposited sum to be paid to you as the next of kin
to the bonafide beneficiary of this fund. 
As soon as you make this application, the payment will
immediately be approved for remittance into the
account you will nominate because the Deposited sum
has been floating waiting for claim and all the
Deposited fund on this category have been paid
remaining this USD14.5million. 
We need to be fast on this deal there is no need to
waste time, I wish to resign for an international
business as soon as you confirm to me that the fund
has hit your account. 
I will furnish you with the necessary documents as
soon as I hear from you with your personal data and an
assurance that this deal should not be disclosed to
any body now and after the conclusion of the deal.
This 
deal does not need any kind of loudness it should be
between me and you a third ear could ruin the deal for
us, please adhere to this. 
Here is my confidential phone number for this
transaction 234-8033216612, as soon as you get this
mail, I will like you to call me immediately so that
we can discuss more about this transaction ok.
Regards as I expect your urgent response and phone
call. 
Yours brother
Dr John Jones
 
+++

Notice these parts above: "board of the (UBA)" and
"the UBA board"?  The UBA is the United Bank of
Africa.  Our Lad (who is with STB of course) can't
keep his scams straight.

ett dumhuvud = a dumb cluck
Thanks to Groucho Marx for most of the travelogue.

messages.body:
Dr John,

Halla!  I am confused, you are talking in circles.  I
have Already given you my bank account number.  What
are you waiting for, man?  Just send the money over,
stop playing around with bank boards.  Why do you need
me to retype things on my company letterhead (paper)
when we can transfer the money electronically (email)?
 Explain your goodself, man, don't be such ett
dumhuvud.

Thank you for the biography.  I am a musician, that is
why I have traveled so many places.  Sweden is a
special place to me.  So is Africa.  Africa is God's
country, and he can have it.  I've visited South
Africa, playing as part of a band.  I went hunting
there, looking for elks.  The elks live up in the
hills, and in the spring they come down for their
annual convention. It is very interesting to watch
them come to the water hole. And you should see them
run when they find it is only a water hole. We tried
to remove the tusks of an elephant that had been shot
but they were embedded in so firmly that we couldn't
budge them. Of course in Alabama the Tuscaloosa but
that's entirely irrelephant to what I was talking
about. We took some pictures of the native girls, but
they weren't developed, but we're going back again in
a couple of weeks. 

I met my wife when I was on tour in Sweden, that's how
I picked up so much of the language.  She's a special
lady.  A special, special lady.  She doesn't mind me
traveling so much and often accompanies me.  Perhaps
we can introduce her to your Agatha.  Send me your
wife's email address and I will have my wife contact
her.

Let's get moving on our business!  Don't waste any
more of our precious time!

Tag fast tjuven! 
Johnson
(my picture is attached)

+++

If you want to read the full original speech, Google
for "entirely irrelephant"
My attachment was a picture of the real Doctor John.

Thank you for your mail, i am really sorry that you
could not understand what i am talking about
concerning the transfer of this fund into your
account.
You have to understand that before this fund will be
transferred into your account, we have to process the
banking procedure to enable the fund move without any
delay.
I know that you have sent your banking informations to

messages.body:
Dr Mark,

How did you get to be a bank director without being
able to do math?
You say 
0.01% is $14,500 (which is wrong, but let's pretend
it's right for a second).
Then you say
0.001% = %7,250

That's wrong.  0.001% is one-tenth of 0.01%.  Do you
at least understand that?  There is NO WAY that 14500
divided by 10 is 7250.  And your base number is WRONG
anyway.  14500000 * .01% is 1450.  14500000 * 0.001%
is $145.  You can verify this on any calculator.  Even
on your PC - bring up the calculator, then put in
14500000 times 0.001 and hit the percent sign.  See
how easy that is?

I will bring the $145.  I will not bring one cent
more, since that is what you have now told me three
times is the charge.

If you are not comfortable doing basic math, perhaps
you can find a worker there who knows how to multiply
correctly.

JOHNSON SCHULER.

messages.body:
Dr Mark,

I am not traveling on American Airlines.  I expect to
travel on British Airways, which lands during the
daytime, not midnight like you said.  Please provide
directions and address for your bank headquarters
since my associate informs me that lawlessness is a
problem in Nigeria.  It is interesting that you have
programmable cars, I have not seen a computer car here
but one time in Sweden I saw a car that ran on a
computer program.  It would go zooming down the street
then it would stop very fast at red lights.  You had
to wear good seat belts.  But it was like a train, you
could read in it while it drove but it was very jerky
on stops and starts.  I was in one one time but it ran
into a VW Bug.

My associate will be handling the payment of the
signing fee, I will be bringing the $145 due as a
transfer fee.  I will also be bringing some lovely new
calculators as gifts.

Halla. Sounds great. But you must understand, I am not leaving the airport with anyone other than you, thank you for sending me your picture before. If anyone else approaches me, I will pretend I do not know them and I will not go with them. I do not want to be robbed by an imposter, thank you for letting me know how lawless Nigeria can be. I am traveling with too much cash to take that kind of chance. I will go directly from there to the bank since I am told that hotels can be dens of thieves, and YOU STILL HAVE NOT TOLD ME THE HOTEL. So I have left my travel agent a message to make a reservation for me. I trust bank lobbies more than hotel lobbies you understand ok.

I still have not found Lydia, she doesn't answer the phone at home. I may have to cut my trip there shorter because of this so you must be ready the second I touch down at 5 AM Tuesday.

I will bring the $145 that the director says I owe. I think you said you owe $1000, you need to take care of that. In case something happens to my suitcase with my cash, I found a Western Union that would do a transfer today, I sent $1000 to you, JOHN JONES, in a city called Abuja. They said it was safer than Lagos and very close by. So that will be the backup in case British Airways loses my bag and the $$$$ in it.

Off to bed, see you Tuesday AM.

Johnson

messages.body:
Dear Dr Jones,

Can you help me out?  Lydia and I are delayed in
London.  She intercepted me at Heathrow while I was
changing planes, she was waiting for me.  I guess I
never will fool that woman.  She and I had a long talk
here in the airport and I missed my connection to
Lagos.  Tried calling your phone but it didn't go
through.  We're working things out and she will be
coming with me to Nigeria.  

Tomorrow's flight is booked solid so we can't get
there together till Thursday morning, we're camping
out at the airport internet lounge and waiting to fly
standby.  She is looking forward to meeting Agatha.

Meanwhile, MY SUITCASE WITH MY MONEY MADE THE TRIP TO
LAGOS!  Damn airlines.  The suitcase made the
connection, I didn't.  My suitcase is at the British
Airways security counter at the Lagos airport, the
airport people connected me to the desk there and I
talked to them, they will hold it for a week.  Can you
do me a favor and pick it up for me, I really don't
want all that cash just sitting there under the guard
of somebody making a few dollars an hour ok I want it
in the hands of you who I trust.  We will be there on
6/5 and then we can finish the business ok.

All you have to do is go to the British Airways desk
in the baggage claim area and give them the name I'm
flying under, Hiemel Kiedda.  He's a Swedish radio
announcer but they won't know that.  They may ask you
to show you an ID that has that name on it, but they
probably won't you know airport security ok.

Let me know when you get the suitcase.  We have
tickets for the flight that leaves here at 10:30 on
Virgin flight 651, arriving Lagos at 5 AM on 6/5.

Johnson

Dear Dr John,

Halla.  We are at the Sheraton Hotel, we went and saw
the beach since we got in too late for the bank.  We
didn't go out in the water because a thunderstorm was
coming up, but it was a pleasant 80 degrees or so. 
That was a nice change, it's been cool at home.  

We will be hosting a party tonight, look for a large
table of people at the Pili Pili restaurant here
tonight.  Here is a picture of the hotel so you can be
sure you are in the right place.  You can see the limo
the barrister sent in the photo.  The phones here are
pretty lousy, I can barely keep a connection.

Lydia is thrilled about the news of Carlos Heskey. 
This is a beautiful thing you are doing for us.  How
did you learn her maiden name?  She had not seen
Carlos for many years and this is a great excitement
for her.  We called the bank and talked to mister
A**** and he was very excited to hear from her.  The
account is over $11 million, which is less than you
had said but still is a lot of money :)

We will plan to meet you at the bank Friday at 8 AM or
tonight at the hotel restaurant if you can make it. 
If the Pili Pili restaurant is too crowded we will go
instead to the Crockpot.  It's about 3 PM now but
we're exhausted and will be napping until dinner.  See
you then.

Har du inte fått något job!
Johnson
